tagline: quandrei: a cipher, wrapped in an enigma, smothered in secret sauce
body:
### Mission Statement
I am currently in transition from my old [website](http://transparent-aluminium.com/). I will be gradually updating, and moving that content to my [github pages](http://pages.github.com/) space.

### Curriculum Vitae
My current CV can be found [here](http://transparent-aluminium.com/curriculum-vitae/).

### Contact
I can be contacted by email: andrea.zarbo@gmail.com
